text: Ezɨ Sarai kamagh Abram mɨgei, “Hagar nan akaba barazir puvatɨ, kar nɨn osɨmtɨzimra. Guizbangɨra kɨ uabɨ a isa nɨn amuimɨn mɨn nɨ ganɨngi. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn a uabɨ gɨfo a navim asangi, egha uabɨ pɨrafa, egha nan akaba barazir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God uabɨ nɨ Abram, ko nan mɨgɨrɨgɨaba tuisɨghasa kɨ ifonge.”
